name: Duplicate - negative number bug already reported
description: Issue about negative numbers should be detected as duplicate of #2

input.title: Bug: subtract function gives wrong answer with negative numbers
input.body:
## Description
When I use `subtract(5, -3)` the result seems incorrect.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Run `subtract(5, -3)`
2. Get result 8

## Expected
Not sure what the correct result should be but this feels wrong.

## Notes
This might be a duplicate of an existing issue about negative numbers.
